p: The new IgG/IgM antibody enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) kit was obtained from the Zhuhai Livzon Diagnostics Inc., China. Serum specimens for the ELISA IgG and IgM antibodies tests were obtained from infected cases on February 2, 2020. The 98 serum specimens were tested in accordance with the manufacturerâ€™s instructions.
